summary.purpose: Provides a styled Label component built on top of @radix-ui/react-label, following the shadcn/ui design pattern for accessible form labels.
summary.problem_solved: Wraps Radix UI's Label primitive with consistent Tailwind CSS styling including text size, font weight, text selection prevention, and automatic disabled state handling when used with peer/group patterns.

symbols.name: Label
symbols.signature: function Label({ className, ...props }: React.ComponentProps<typeof LabelPrimitive.Root>): JSX.Element
symbols.description: A form label component that wraps @radix-ui/react-label with pre-configured Tailwind CSS styles. Includes a data-slot='label' attribute for styling hooks. Automatically handles disabled states via group-data and peer-disabled CSS patterns, reducing opacity and preventing pointer events when the associated form control is disabled. Text is non-selectable by default.

details.rendered_ui_description: A small (text-sm), medium-weight text label rendered as a Radix UI Label element. Text is not user-selectable. When a sibling or grouped form element is disabled, the label becomes semi-transparent and non-interactive.
